cu.explanation_en: Setting mcc to 0, which is an invalid MCC value, will cause PLMN configuration failure and prevent network registration.

du.explanation_en: Setting dl_carrierBandwidth to 200, which exceeds the valid range for downlink carrier bandwidth, will cause invalid cell configuration and transmission failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將 dl_carrierBandwidth 設定為 200，超出下行載波頻寬的有效範圍，會導致無效的細胞配置，並造成傳輸失敗。
